    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractClient
    The AbstractClient contains all the methods necessary to set up the client side of a client-server architecture.
    AbstractReportController
    Abstract base class for all report-related GUI controllers.
    AbstractScreensController
    Abstract base controller class for all GUI screens in the client.
    AbstractServer
    The AbstractServer class maintains a thread that waits for connection attempts from clients.
    ClientApp
    Entry point for the Bpark client application.
    ClientCore
    Core client class that handles communication with the server and provides methods for various client operations.
    ClientLoginController
    Controller for the Bpark Client Login screen.
    CommandPacket
    Represents a data packet exchanged between client and server.
    CommandPacket
    Represents a data packet exchanged between client and server.
    ConnectionToClient
    An instance of this class is created by the server when a client connects.
    DBconnector
    A utility class for managing a MySQL database connection.
    DBhandler
    Handles all database-related operations and message dispatching for the Bpark server.
    DiscordNotifier
    Utility class responsible for sending structured notifications to Discord webhooks.
    ManagerScreensController
    Controller for the Manager interface in the Bpark system.
    MonthlyReportsThread
    A background thread that runs continuously to generate and save monthly report CSVs.
    ObservableClient
    This class acts as a subclass of AbstractClient and is also an Observable class.
    ObservableOriginatorServer
    The ObservableOriginatorServer is a subclass of ObservableServer that sends OriginatorMessage instances to its observers.
    ObservableServer
    This class acts as a subclass of AbstractServer and is also an Observable class.
    OrderMonitorThread
     
    OriginatorMessage
    A message class used by the Observable layer of the OCSF in order to conserve information about the originator of a message.
    ParkingReportController
    Controller for displaying parking report data in bar chart form.
    QRcontroller
     
    ReportsCSV
    Utility class for handling CSV report generation and reading for parking and user activity.
    ServerApp
    Entry point for the Bpark Server JavaFX application.
    ServerConnectionsController
    Controller for the Server GUI that displays live connection updates.
    ServerCore
    ServerCore is the main server-side controller extending AbstractServer.
    ServerGUIController
    Controller for the Bpark Server GUI.
    UserScreensController
    Controller for the User interface in the Bpark system.
    UsersReportController
